name: Treat ideas like cattle, not pets with Daniel Vassallo, creator of smallbets.co (Ship It! #88)
summary: In our ops &amp; infra world, we learn to optimise for redundancy, for mean time to recovery and for graceful degradation. We instinctively recognise single points of failure, and try to mitigate the risks associated with them.
